definition: مسكن maskan, maskin pl. مساكن masākin2 dwelling, abode, habitation; house; home, residence, domicile مسكن musakkin pl. -ūn pacifier, soother; (pl. -āt) sedative, tranquilizer مسكن II tamaskana to become poor, be reduced to poverty; to pretend to be poor; to feign poverty or humility; to be submissive, servile, slavish, fawning
